title: Video shows brawl in deli aisle at Publix
content: . Jim: A CHICKEN WING BRAWL IN THE DELI AISLE OF A FLORIDA PUBLIX. CELL PHONE CAMERAS WERE ROLLING AT THE TAMPA AREA GROCERY STORE. Meredith: BYSTANDERS SAY ONE CUSTOMER USED RACIAL SLURS WHILE PLACING AN ORDER. A CO-WORKER STEPPED IN TELLING THE CUSTOMER TO BACK OFF AND
